import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "../assets/css/style.css"; import "../assets/css/responsive.css"; import "../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import Logo from '../assets/images/logo.png'; const Header = () => { const [open_menu, setOpen_menu] = useState("false"); const openMenu = () => { setOpen_menu(!open_menu); } useEffect(() => { document.html.classList.toggle('cm_overflow', !open_menu); },[open_menu]) return(
  • Home

); } export default Header;
